mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (user_id, board_title, board_content, board_category) VALUE (1, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent},#{boardCategory})
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.board_title, b.board_title, b.board_created, b.board_category, u.user_nickname FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE b.id = #{id}
